languages.text: "Поразительно! Воистину, только {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}человеку ваших талантов{/d} под силу сделать из без того выдающегося судна настоящую пустотную жемчужину".
"Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."
languages.original_text: "Поразительно! Воистину, только {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}человеку ваших талантов{/d} под силу сделать из без того выдающегося судна настоящую пустотную жемчужину".

traits.locale_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."
"Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

"Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void. I will report to you when the Heartless is ready."

"Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void. I will report to you when the Heartless is ready."
"Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."
"Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

languages.text: “真是太了不起了！只有像您这样{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}才华横溢{/d}的人，才能把本就无比美妙的舰船变成虚空中真正的珍宝。”
languages.original_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

traits.locale_text: “真是太了不起了！只有像您这样{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}才华横溢{/d}的人，才能把本就无比美妙的舰船变成虚空中真正的珍宝。等无心号准备好之后，我会立刻向您禀报。”
“真是太了不起了！只有像您这样{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}才华横溢{/d}的人，才能把本就无比美妙的舰船变成虚空中真正的珍宝。等无心号准备好之后，我会立刻向您禀报。”

languages.text: 「素晴らしい！すでに卓越した船を、虚空の真の宝石へと仕上げるには、まさに{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}あなたのような才覚ある人物{/d}が必要なんです。ハートレスの準備が整い次第、ご報告します」
languages.original_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void. I will report to you when the Heartless is ready."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい！すでに卓越した船を、虚空の真の宝石へと仕上げるには、まさに{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}あなたのような才覚ある人物{/d}が必要なんです。ハートレスの準備が整い次第、ご報告します」

languages.text: «¡Extraordinario! Sin duda, solo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}una persona con su talento{/d} es capaz de convertir una nave excepcional en una verdadera joya del vacío».
languages.original_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

traits.locale_text: «¡Extraordinario! Sin duda, solo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}una persona con su talento{/d} es capaz de convertir una nave excepcional en una verdadera joya del vacío. L{mf|e|a} informaré cuando la Desalmada esté lista».

languages.text: "Erstaunlich! Es bedarf in der Tat einer {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Person mit Euren Talenten{/d}, um ein ohnehin schon außergewöhnliches Schiff in ein wahres Juwel der Leere zu verwandeln."
languages.original_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

traits.locale_text: "Erstaunlich! Es bedarf in der Tat einer {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Person mit Euren Talenten{/d}, um ein ohnehin schon außergewöhnliches Schiff in ein wahres Juwel der Leere zu verwandeln."

"Erstaunlich! In der Tat bedarf es einer {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Person mit Euren Talenten{/d}, um ein bereits außergewöhnliches Schiff in ein wahres Juwel der Leere zu verwandeln. Ich werde Euch Bericht erstatten, wenn die Heartless bereit ist."

languages.text: "Fevkalade! Hâlihazırda harika bir gemiyi, uçsuzdan gelen gerçek bir mücevhere dönüştürmek için {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}sizin gibi yetenekli biri{/d} şart."
languages.original_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

traits.locale_text: "Fevkalade! Hâlihazırda harika bir gemiyi, uçsuzdan gelen gerçek bir mücevhere dönüştürmek için {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}sizin gibi yetenekli biri{/d} şart. Taşkalp hazır olduğunda size haber vereceğim."

languages.text: « Extraordinaire ! Seul {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}quelqu'un de votre trempe{/d} serait capable de transformer ce vaisseau exceptionnel en véritable bijou du vide. »
languages.original_text: "Extraordinary! Indeed it takes a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}person of your talents{/d} to turn an already exceptional ship into a true jewel of the void."

traits.locale_text: « Extraordinaire ! Seul {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}quelqu'un de votre trempe{/d} serait capable de transformer ce vaisseau exceptionnel en véritable bijou du vide. »

« Extraordinaire ! Seul {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}quelqu'un de votre trempe{/d} serait capable de transformer ce vaisseau exceptionnel en véritable bijou du vide. Je vous préviendrai lorsque le Sans-Cœur sera prêt. »
